remarks: Add three elements to the end of a structure.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
strlemor.f $e |- ( Fun `' `' F /\ dom F C_ ( 1 ... I ) ) $.
strlemor.i $e |- I e. NN0 $.
strlemor.o $e |- I < J $.
strlemor.j $e |- J e. NN $.
strlemor.a $e |- A = J $.
strlemor2.o $e |- J < K $.
strlemor2.k $e |- K e. NN $.
strlemor2.b $e |- B = K $.
strlemor3.o $e |- K < L $.
strlemor3.l $e |- L e. NN $.
strlemor3.c $e |- C = L $.
strlemor3.g $e |- G = ( F u. { <. A , X >. , <. B , Y >. , <. C , Z >. } ) $.
strlemor3 $p |- ( Fun `' `' G /\ dom G C_ ( 1 ... L ) ) $.
